  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="48903" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="48903" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.38</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="5807">5,807</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="802"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>1 Million Lucky</b> by <b>Rabanne</b> is a Woody fragrance for men. <b>1 Million Lucky</b> was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Natalie Gracia-Cetto. Top notes are Plum, Ozonic notes, Grapefruit and Bergamot; middle notes are Hazelnut, Honey, Cedar, Cashmere Wood, Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Amberwood, Patchouli, Vetiver and Oakmoss. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>The best-selling perfumes from the house of Paco Rabanne 1 Million (2008) and Lady Million (2010) get the new interpretations that come out in the spring of 2018 - 1 Million Lucky and Lady Million Lucky.</p>

<p>"Seize your dreams and build your own life. Intensely. Grab hold of happiness when it arises. Pure feeling. Tremble, share, and dare. Without limits. Live every moment, without delay."</p>

<p>One Million Lucky Eau de Toilette is announced as a pulsating and captivating scent of woody and gourmand tones. It is described as fresh, vivid and sensual. Hazelnut note enriches the composition of woody elements, with fresh ozone combined with Greengage plum.</p>

<p>It is available as a 50 and 100 ml Eau de Toilette.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a     <span class="badge">15</span>
</div>
<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/13386/news.13386-120x120.jpg" alt="1 Million Parfum Paco Rabanne" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/1-Million-Parfum-Paco-Rabanne-13386.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>1 Million Parfum Paco Rabanne</h4>
        </a>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350997" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trimethylglycine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747995"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1747995.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trimethylglycine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-World/Royal-Blend-94022.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94022.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Blend"title="Royal Blend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350997ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350997" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747995">Trimethylglycine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know what it is, but I just can't really bring myself to enjoy it. The notes look great and it should be something really pleasant and the first 5 minutes are, but after that it just gets weird for me. It's not awful, just feels confused and all over the place. Not for me but I can see people enjoying this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2350997"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2350997#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348694" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jlog23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555933.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jlog23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348694ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348694" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555933">jlog23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive been trying to not buy this frag for so long as Im TRYING to stay away from sweeter scents. I just couldnt resist. The plum, honey, floral touches, and slight ozonic feel with heavy amber wood base just hits all the right boxes for me. Its lovely</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2348694"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2348694#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>

Received endless compliments and the longevity is massive. I can still smell it on my jacket after 2 days! Batch 83401 seems very concentrated. <br />
Highly recommended . <br />
9/10 scent <br />
10/10 longevity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2345283"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2345283#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340974" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="9emirrhan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962876"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962876.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="9emirrhan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962876">9emirrhan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overly sweet fragrance. People would realise as soon as you come in to room but can be cloying if you spray to much. The syntheticity of plum, extreme sweetness off honey are 2 notes that make this perfume too sweet and headache-inducing. It can cloy you too easily. Bought an 50ML bottle, people like it, I'm trying to like it. but seems like I would not buy the 2nd bottle. Even extremely sweet perfumes like Ultra Male - Million Elixir did not make me this tired  like this one. But still can be okay when you don't spray too much.<br />
<br />
edit: Used it for 1 week got few compliments but honey and plum note cloyed me so bad that I don't wanna smell honey anymore.<br />
<br />
edit2: I sold it. Cloyed me insanely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2340974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2340974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331935" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Phil413"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1342552.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Phil413" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Red-Tobacco-46663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Tobacco"title="Red Tobacco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342552">Phil413</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 17:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The hazelnut is absolutely delicious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2331935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2331935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314333" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kage24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633789"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1633789.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kage24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-39314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton"title="Layton"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314333ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314333" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633789">Kage24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 08:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Have a bottle 90% full willing to swap if anyone interested.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2314333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2314333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306355" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nateingy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219467"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2219467.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="nateingy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53215.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halloween Man X"title="Halloween Man X"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306355ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306355" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219467">nateingy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 20:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As the reviewer below me said (TPAB_15), at least in the US, this and all other Paco Rabanne products are 15% off in-store and online at Macy's right now. When I saw this, I rushed down to my mall to grab 1 Million Lucky since it's never at discounters, and I couldn't be happier.<br />
<br />
I've smelled this before at Sephora a couple of times, and the first time I smelled it, it immediately reminded me of another fragrance; English Laundy's Charmer, it's almost 1 to 1. I bought it around the same time last year from a TJMaxx for $15 before I was really into fragrances, and I had no idea it was a clone (or what clones were lol). I still have a tiny bit left and I sprayed it on for comparison; Charmer is definitely on the lighter and brighter side in dry-down (somewhat laundry-like, ironic) while I get a little more patchouli and vetiver with Lucky. However, the opening of Charmer is almost exactly the same as Lucky, and Lucky's dry-down becomes more and more similar to Charmer with time. Performance wasn't great with Charmer, but it would last a good 4-6 hours on skin and stick to clothes a while longer. I'm not saying you should go out and order it for $35, but if you see it at TJMaxx or Marshall's for $15... it might be worth the pickup. I recently went to a Marshall's that had two bottles in stock, so it's still floating around out there.<br />
<br />
All that being said, having gone through almost a full bottle of such a similar scent, 1 Million Lucky brings back a lot of good memories. It's pretty unique amongst the 1 Million line, and it's definitely one of the better scents. I was about to order a bottle of 1 Million Royal when I came across the Macy's sale, and I'm really glad I did. This is something I'd wear in any season except the summer, and I think it works both during the day and at night. Overall this gets an easy 9.5/10 from me, it's such an enjoyable scent. Easy blind buy, and a no-brainer if you can find it on sale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2306355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2306355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303657" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TPAB_15"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2274943"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2274943.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TPAB_15" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2274943">TPAB_15</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know if this is discontinued outside of the US, but in the US you can find this at pretty much any frag store. I got mine from Macy's and it came with a 1 Million deodorant and a 10ml sample of the original 1 Million for about $110 USD (They are having a sale as of 10/3/24).<br />
<br />
To start off, this fragrance is straight up addictive. Each time I sampled this at a store, I liked it more than the last time. <br />
<br />
To note, this fragrance should be worn cautiously in anything above 70F, but that's the only real con. The longevity is around 7-8 hours with a medium projection for 3-4. This would be suitable for almost anything except formal settings, just be careful with the trigger. I believe that anybody can rock any fragrance they like, but if I had to give it an age range, I'd say 16-40.<br />
<br />
It is youthful, seductive, and versatile, which is why I give this fragrance a 9/10! If you like sweet fragrances, this is for you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2303657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2303657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="latafan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133260"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1133260.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="latafan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bombshell-10190.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10190.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombshell"title="Bombshell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133260">latafan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 20:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has not been available in Asia and large parts of Europe for the longest time now while apparently being pretty much constantly available in the US on Paco Rabanne's page itself or Macy's.<br />
<br />
Now, finally, it has reappeared at least on Germany's Paco Rabanne page for order - not sure about other European countries. I guess they may have been reformulating it to suit some new component regulations?<br />
<br />
Anyway, if anyone bought this in Europe recently and knows how it used to smell, please share your impressions!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2303072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2303072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292474" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FoxHound215"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2224902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2224902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FoxHound215" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292474ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292474" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2224902">FoxHound215</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm at work and I should be going through this pile of papers in front of me, but instead I'm on this site to write a glowing review of 1 Million Lucky.<br />
<br />
This scent is incredible. Quite possible the best out of the Million line by Paco Rabanne. The smell is sweet, but not as strong as the other Million fragrances in the line up. This one is more fun and youthful, very vibrant. The only reason this isn't a summer/spring fragrance is because of the honey/nutty/woody notes that go with it. It's a little too heavy for the summer- the spring is as far as I'd take it. <br />
<br />
The price is a little high for this one, but being that it's the best in the line, I guess that's what you'd expect. Find yourself a decant on a site if you don't want to spend $120 or more on blind buying this. I know a good one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2292474"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2292474#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292174" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eliseoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eliseoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-Le-Parfum-23099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"title="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132">eliseoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 03:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Decided to rewrite a review for this one. <br />
So the opening for this is one of the best things I've ever smelled (i love my ozonic notes) and then evolves to be more hazelnut based, but the far dry down of this is what made me change my mind. Probably the most boring amberwood I've ever smelled, its not interesting, nor does it really even smell that great.<br />
This does project in the high-moderate range and lasts around 12 hours on my skin though. It is good but the far dry down is just disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2292174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2292174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290219" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290219" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hamnas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/274293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.274293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hamnas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Shaghaf-Oud-Azraq-82383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shaghaf Oud Azraq"title="Shaghaf Oud Azraq"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290219ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290219" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/274293">hamnas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 05:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If anyone looking for this in UAE, please reach out to me on <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="ee868f83808f9ddcdeded9ae89838f8782c08d8183">[email&#160;protected]</a>. I have a tester bottle for sale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2290219"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2290219#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276514" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PeopleTent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PeopleTent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276514ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276514" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208922">PeopleTent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 00:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From a person that receives very few likes through out all social media platforms (which i have no clue why) and is somewhat disconnected from current trends and whats considered the social norms( happily). <br />
I was skeptical of all those "reformulation for the worse" comments about various scents and considered it all just to be rumors or even some type of fragrance conspiracy. Untill I repurchased 1 million lucky not long ago. And let me tell you that my veiws are now almost a complete 180 degrees to now paying attention to the chatting/warning signs. <br />
<br />
Long story short, when I first had lucky years ago(the clear back bottle), it was to potent and persistent for my new to the fragrance world nose at the time. But fast forward to the current formulation (the dark back bottle). It's just a mere shadow of what it once was. I might go as far as to say that it smells like nothing in the far drydown. Yes you read right, fragrance nothingness i.e. most notably 1 million gold, Invictus Aqua 2018 and the new Dior sauvage eau forte). <br />
<br />
What a disappointment. It almost feels like a $100 wasted. I even told my friend about it and he said I should have returned it. But I said I'm a give it a chance because maybe it will mancerate and get better. <br />
All resulting in me saying, <br />
no to reformulations that diminish a products quality. Just discontinue it instead or just don't change it. <br />
Oh, one positive to come from this is that a lesson was learned for my future in purchasing anything.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2276514"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2276514#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268606" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wild_Willy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2037123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2037123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wild_Willy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Bad-Boy-Cobalt-Elixir-89374.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89374.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bad Boy Cobalt Elixir"title="Bad Boy Cobalt Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2037123">Wild_Willy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 20:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely gorgeous scent, this is the best of the bunch in my opinion. Its just so silky sweetly smooth and hits all the right notes. Everything flows together so nicely in this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2268606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2268606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268171" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="efeoznehir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022421"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2022421.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="efeoznehir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022421">efeoznehir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 10:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I try this for first time ''Wow!'' its really well blended fragrance its not give you a headache or eww like its pretty good. Scent is very good I got alot of nut, plum vanilla type sweetness I think because of the honey. Longevity quite good not the best. Projection is under average or average its perfect for date actually.<br />
<br />
Scent:10/10<br />
Longevity:7/10<br />
Projection:6/10<br />
Price:8/10<br />
<br />
Perfect for fall, Night, winter can wearable in spring but not best time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2268171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2268171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267503" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saitis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589184"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="saitis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267503ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267503" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589184">saitis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 17:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rating my collection #1<br />
<br />
This was the first fragrance in my collection and holds a special place in my heart. Sadly, it's discontinued and sold out everywhere.<br />
<br />
Upon spraying, you're blasted with a symphony of sweet and fruity notes, with ozonic touches adding a pleasant freshness in the background. To my nose, the most prominent notes are honey, plum, and nuts. For the price, you get "niche-level" quality and performance.<br />
<br />
It's a versatile scent that you can rock on most occasions, any time of day. It attracts attention without being offensive. However, it's best to avoid wearing it in extreme heat. I  enjoy wearing this on casual night outs or coffee dates.<br />
<br />
Smell: 10/10 (Masterpiece)<br />
Performance: 9/10<br />
Value: 8.5/10<br />
Season: All (Avoid extreme heat)<br />
Occasion: Night outs / Coffee dates<br />
Recommendation: Buy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2267503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2267503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264500" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264500" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshzcents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768322"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1768322.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshzcents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Blue-60332.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60332.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coach Blue"title="Coach Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264500ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264500" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768322">Marshzcents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 03:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my brother's signature fragrance. After trying it in many occasions as well as smelling it so often, I'm so familiarized with this scent to the point that, I felt obliged to make a review. (Despite never owning it myself)<br />
The opening smells like when it starts raining, it is very overwhelmingly woody and alluring about it. What I smelt as some kind of incense or tobacco note is probably the the earthy, dirty style of patchouli this has, it is so freaking good and unique, this is probably the best 1 million flanker along with the Parfum. This is the most mature smelling too imo, if you're a guy in his 30s I recommend this perfume to you, specially if you like masculine, sweet fragrances. 8.5/10. The only possible and subjective opinion I have on this is that it is a really aggressive fragrance, this will not be office or school safe for sure, keep this for going out or for dates with few sprays you'll be set, this projects like crazy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It is a beautiful honey nutty fragrance. It doesnt project the best for me but it does last long, and I will savor every spray of this stuff so I make sure it lasts. It is definitely a mens fragrance, but today I smelt it and it almost reminded me of a perfume I smelt on a girl, and the more I smell Lucky I see it as a unisex fragrance. I wear it all year round and constantly make new discoveries about it. Its a designer fragrance but smells niche. 10000/10 I need to buy more before its no longer in circulation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2263198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2263198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258434" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vlab_frag_enthusiast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076836"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2076836.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vlab_frag_enthusiast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Infrared-Eau-de-Parfum-81409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum"title="Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258434ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258434" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076836">vlab_frag_enthusiast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best one in the 1 million line by far. Its not even comparable to the original, this is the bigger better brother that is better in every way then the other siblings. I love hazelnuts and the smell is heavenly, sadly this is discontinued and its hard to find these days. Theres many fakes out there. Honestly buy nike ultra green, its better because it smells the same with a little worse performance and its very cheap. Nike ultra green isnt available in my country but i paid a bit more for shipping and i got it for 25$ for 200ml bottle. Still, if you have this good on you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2258434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2258434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256131" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256131" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="primotenore"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301770"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1301770.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="primotenore" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Lucky"title="1 Million Lucky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256131ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256131" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301770">primotenore</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 06:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Discovered this scent by accident when I purchased a shave soap by Stirling called Solidus. Turns out it's a dupe of 1 Million Lucky. Had to find a bottle of the OG. This is fantastic juice. Fragheads would call this a gourmand---and I don't disagree with that moniker. I find it quite masculine and the woody notes to be sublime. One of the worst scents from this line is 1 Million Parfum---a scent I found abhorrent, so I was very pleasantly surprised to learn this was a 1 Million flanker. Long-lasting; decent projection; perfect on all but the hottest days. IMO leans masculine. This stank gets an enthusiastic thumbs up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2256131"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2256131#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229814" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ideal.my.fav"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256672"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ideal.my.fav" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus"title="Invictus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229814ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229814" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256672">ideal.my.fav</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 05:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has eternal performance on me for some reason like 16 hours on skin with 8-10 hours maybe even more projection, lasts weeks on clothes and I dont know how. Maybe it does not blind my nose at all which makes it feel super strong. The scent has unique sweet aura and it is one of the smoothest sweet fragrance i have in my collection. I have 2022 and 2018 batches and they smell and perform pretty much the same. I no longer can find a brand new bottle of this so it is probably discontinued. One of the best paco rabanne after one million edt and invictus edt.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2229814"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2229814#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229236" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215915" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mothball"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539654"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1539654.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mothball" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215915ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215915" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539654">Mothball</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 20:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very sweet and very fruity with a hint of freshness. Great for fall winter and spring (summer nights too if you go easy on the trigger). Plum is very noticeable so avoid if you don't like that note. Different enough from other One Million fragrances (so not redundant to own this if you like the others). Women love the scent trail. Definitely NOT one for the office. Best suited for younger men or casual occasions. Performance is stellar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2215915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2215915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Performance : 9/10<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199447" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="agape84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2177270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="agape84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199447ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199447" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2199447"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2199447#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197134" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfect Shot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304485"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfect Shot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304485">Perfect Shot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong sweet plum from the get go. It is too sweet for hot summer days, but it being fruity makes it wearable on spring and days, in fact i'd say its better for days than nights, as at nights you usually prefer more woody and darker scents. This is fruity sweet. <br />
The only downside of this is it is extremely similar to a $5 scent which is Nike Ultra Green. This one smells a little bit smoother, less sweet and with better quality than Nike's, but you can only pick up that difference smelling it side to side and with someone that has a lot of experience. In the air the difference would be imperceptible unless you are extremely experienced with One Million Lucky. Longevity isn't much different either, 6-8 hours vs 5-6 hours for Nike's. <br />
<br />
It is a nice fragrance but completely not worth buying, especially now that rumors of discontinuation are spreading that makes prices shoot up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2197134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2197134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189740" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karq"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1988200"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1988200.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karq" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Parfum-27417.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27417.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Parfum"title="Dior Homme Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1988200">karq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-16">06/16/24 02:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens with sttong plum and hazelnut note, freshened a little by the orange blossom, then it dries down to honey. Reminds me of JPG Scandal Absolu with its neauseating sweetness. Turns out I don't enjoy the plum note, but the nutty honey drydown for me is quite enjoyable. Would recommend it to a younger crowd. A pass for me. The sillage is pretty hefty and longevity is above average. Its difficult to find it at a discounted price where I live</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2189740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2189740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188785" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ACM_333"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087024.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ACM_333" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/L-Insoumis-Ma-Force-50099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Insoumis Ma Force"title="L'Insoumis Ma Force"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087024">ACM_333</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 00:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 mil lucky<br />
Very sweet fruity nutty fresh fragrance which smells similar to Nutella and caramel popcorn, a very gourmand scent, main notes of Sweet honey and plum backed up by a fresh opening of Ozonic notes and grapefruit, has a very sweet nutty scent due to the hazelnut, also has a very woody vibe with sweet amber wood and clean cashmere wood essence with a touch of a soapy white floral edge, finishing off with a calm vetiver and herbaceous patchouli.<br />
Longevity 8.30 hrs<br />
Projection 6.5/10<br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Season: fall, spring, winter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2188785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2188785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
