<br />
Bottle also doubles up as a vanity mirror for thin faced individuals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2186266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2186266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185265" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Silveeer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813573"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Silveeer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Wulong-Cha-X-80465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wulong Cha X"title="Wulong Cha X"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813573">Silveeer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The combination of Plum, hazelnut and honey its just nauseating man. Idk how to describe it, its just bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2185265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2185265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184167" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kristianivanm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1523083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kristianivanm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523083">kristianivanm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unpopular opinion but this is a true summer (+ all season) gourmand to me. <br />
<br />
Refreshing yet sensual. Woody yet sweet. Playful yet clean. A few juxtapositions to best describe Lucky. Genuinely feel you can wear this year-round, day into night. The fruits and ozonic notes in the beginning make it juicy and bright, then into the drydown where it gets sweet and woody. Maybe wouldn't wear this with a suit and tie but could still dress it up for a semi-formal situation. Works for everything else.<br />
<br />
For an EDT, the wear is remarkable! Lasts around 6-8hrs on skin and seems to really cling onto hair.<br />
<br />
If you miss the darker/sweeter scent profiles in the summer months, Lucky will give you that fix. Pray it doesn't get discontinued (per online talk)? If you know for sure, please let me know.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2184167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2184167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182708" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myst&egrave;res du Ch&acirc;teau de D&eacute;"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1223623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myst&egrave;res du Ch&acirc;teau de D&eacute;" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Paco-Rabanne-Pour-Homme-526.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.526.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"title="Paco Rabanne Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223623">Myst&egrave;res du Ch&acirc;teau de D&eacute;</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-09">06/09/24 02:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Young and gourmand. I'm old and the top blast of molecules irritates me. Then it's smooth sailing and enjoyable. Movie date night. I should probably sell this discontinued fragrance or give this to a college kid. My bottle is 3 years old.<br />
<br />
By the way, Cuba's $5 dupes of One Million fragrances are much airier interpretations that are easy to wear, without a commitment to hours of gourmandise.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2182708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2182708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2181599" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FrankM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2159432"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FrankM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Superz/Tenerife-80305.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80305.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tenerife"title="Tenerife"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2181599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2181599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2159432">FrankM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 21:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(Y)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2181599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2181599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179224" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sebastiansmellsgood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sebastiansmellsgood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179224ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179224" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008007">sebastiansmellsgood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 14:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great fragrance that is very mass-appealing. It has a great plum opening into a sweet dry down with great performance. As well as it being decently priced even for retail this fragrance is truly worth the money. Great longevity, great projection, beautiful dry down, and an enjoyable opening. I recommend to anyone who enjoys sweet fragrances</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2179224"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2179224#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178823" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178823" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="danilodeathayde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620729"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1620729.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="danilodeathayde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178823ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178823" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620729">danilodeathayde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 09:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The sweetest in the line so far, perhaps along with the elixir. It opens with a lot of caramel and leans towards a youthful, clubbing sweetness reminiscent of a Le Male that I don't like. There's little almond, and plum is non-existent to my nose. It reminds me more of toffee, artificial chocolate candy with those "fruit" jellies inside. It loses all the floral quality of the original or the Parfum.<br />
<br />
I realize the sweetness I was initially associating, even before Le Male, was from Bad Boy, which is one of the perfumes I like the least. It's hard to overcome this association now. (However, to be fair, it seems much better crafted and more striking than Bad Boy, with hints of originality in the combination of somewhat disparate notes.)<br />
<br />
As it dries down, I start to sense a mango note, which I find more pleasant and gives the perfume a less cloying pomade-like quality. The mango becomes more prominent over time, eventually surpassing the toffee or artificial vanilla cookie sensation. Probably, this note is the "plum," but I identify it as a very sweet mango. A ripe mango juice with sugar, starting to turn in the fridge (with a brownish hue, about to ferment) and a portion of melted caramel and almonds on the side.<br />
<br />
It seems well within a unisex profile, perhaps even leaning towards feminine, reminiscent of a Sweet by Lolita Lempicka or an Egeo Dolce Colors, with its candy-like sweetness and vanilla.<br />
<br />
It's a confusing perfume, scattered all over the place.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2178823"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2178823#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176401" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceLover-35"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118009"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceLover-35" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118009">FragranceLover-35</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 04:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went to a macys about a year ago to test this fragrance and I really liked the nutty smell of this fragrance. However, when I bought a bottle and tested it, it smelled like women's hair gel. I have no idea why and now, I hate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2176401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2176401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175328" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gaboich"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984964"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gaboich" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984964">Gaboich</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The plum note in this lowkey smells like medicine and why does the hazelnut come in for like 15 minutes and just dissapear again.<br />
<br />
I like it but its not how i expected it to smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2175328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2175328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170713" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EyesBobsNose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2141137"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2141137.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EyesBobsNose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2141137">EyesBobsNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very nice citrusy sweet scent with woody notes. The grapefruit &amp; honey combo are amazing together. This can be dressed up or down, and its an easy reach if youre struggling to decide what to wear for the day. This can very easily be your daily driver fragrance. <br />
<br />
Fragrances like this are right up my alley. Not too feminine, just enough masculine. Definitely a unisex fragrance. <br />
<br />
Performance on this one is pretty good. I go nose blind to it fairly quickly but I can detect it after 8+ hours. This fragrance is a solid 8.5/10 for me and I will be keeping it in my arsenal for as long as its around.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2170713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2170713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148040" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PrinceOheb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PrinceOheb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Orto-Parisi/Bergamask-24191.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.24191.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bergamask"title="Bergamask"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2148040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2148040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2139060" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceEmperor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2113205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceEmperor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2139060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2139060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2113205">FragranceEmperor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-28">04/28/24 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pleasant, fun, and great scent. Performance is not an issue so I will get that out of the way. Three or four sprays last me easily ten hours. It opens with a sexy plum, along with aldehydes and very very slight citrus tinge (not very noticeable), along with the hazelnut, cashmere, and honey in the background. It opens pretty fresh but still has heft, a perfect early spring fragrance in my opinion. Once it dries down a bit, you get more wood with the cedar, and the nut and honey get even more intensive, the plum unfortunately fades away along with the aldehydes, and it gets heavier with a bit of amber and a slight flair provided by the patchouli. Overall this is a great fragrance that was unfortunately (I think) discontinued and is pretty pricy. I managed to pick it up at a discounter store for about 100 for a 3.4. Pick this fragrance up while you still can!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2139060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2139060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137605" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Achilles587"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Achilles587" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Kenzo-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-73225.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73225.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kenzo Homme Eau de Parfum"title="Kenzo Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137605ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137605" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556882">Achilles587</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just such a pleasant fragrance. Man or woman, this can be your money maker.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2137605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2137605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135769" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="b00ze157000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1989896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="b00ze157000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1989896">b00ze157000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 05:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One Million Lucky changed my life. Before purchasing and using 1 Million Lucky, I was a homeless, drug-addicted, bum of a father who had left my two children Betty and Anne in a crack house just so that I could get my fix. My life was over, and I was a moment away from committing suicide because my life had truly become worthless, and then I smelled it. The beautiful, sweet, nutty, rich aroma that filled my nose was nothing short of divine. Just smelling 1 Million Lucky brought purpose back into my life and after buying it my addiction was immediately cured. Over the course of 6 months, I managed to make $7,000,000,000 dollars and was able to become that father that I my kids had always hoped for. Due to 1 Million Lucky, money is now never an issue, and I have finally found purpose in my life, all because of this heavenly fragrance that saved my life.<br />
<br />
7.5/10 Can be too sweet sometimes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2135769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2135769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132987" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheFraganist55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029669.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheFraganist55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669">TheFraganist55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is crack to me. Easily the best in the 1 Million line. It's sweet, warm, but also fresh. Starts out with heavy hazelnut, plum, and honey, then dries down to a sweet, woody, and fresh scent. Performance for an EDT is elite. It projects hard for like 2 hours and lasts on me all day with 3-4 sprays. Can be worn in any season besides summer honestly, the freshness adds a lot of versatility to it. Not very masculine, but not all fragrances need to be. It is discontinued so I made sure to grab a bottle before it disappears.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2132987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2132987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130770" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brendan529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1897289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="brendan529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); Upon first spray you get that airy plum and citrus, then it transitions to that hazelnut-honey smell. <br />
<br />
I didn't know what to think when I first purchased it but I gave it a few sprays, and a few weeks, and I finally get what the hype was about. I picked up a 6.8 oz when it was on sale on macy's website. <br />
<br />
this one and the Parfum are a must have imo. 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2130770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2130770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126996" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126996" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tylerss20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2085849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tylerss20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Le-Parfum-64718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Le Parfum"title="Y Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085849">tylerss20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 21:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think I'm just not wired to enjoy the 1 million DNA. I grasp how others enjoy this sweet dessert like fragrance, but I'd really need a spice or dry woods/leather note to offset all the absurd richness to like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2126996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2126996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragnautical"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2010907"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2010907.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragnautical" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Lucky"title="1 Million Lucky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2010907">Fragnautical</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 12:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a beast flanker frag locked behind one of the worse atomizers. if carolina herrera bad boy collection has some of the best atomizers, the 1 million series has the opposite.<br />
<br />
ignoring this, the frag is beautiful. opening of hazelnut and plums mixed with a dash of honey and fallen ozonic stars, leading to a drydown of sweet amber and vetiver, which plays quite a role in this fragrance than the details lead you to believe. <br />
<br />
it's lucky, like pressing the i feel lucky google button, it's just like spraying this frag. <br />
<br />
longevity overstays its welcome, you'll smell this on your skin the next day if you overspray easily. the sillage easily falls between filling a large room or a small porta potty, if you have to use one of them, that isn't really lucky.<br />
<br />
side note edit: i was debating with myself at first to return this fragrance for something else. my gf wanted a proper smell on me that wasn't from a tester. when i sprayed it on my neck, i woke up the next morning with my shirt and pants missing and also my wallet. safe to say, the ladies dig it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2123763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2123763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smell changes with wearing to a more woody and smooth scent. I WANT MORE</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2122829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2122829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122261" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Masoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2036060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Masoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/Hawas-for-Him-46890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hawas for Him"title="Hawas for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036060">Masoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 05:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my girlfriends favorite fragrance on me. Its really good. A good blind buy and almost everyone will like this fragrance. 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2122261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2122261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120833" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AppleShot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2030245.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AppleShot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Black-48682.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48682.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Black"title="Luna Rossa Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030245">AppleShot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 million lucky is a powerful fragrance, the honey notes are very strong, not sure why that's not the highest note. The smell is a little too strong, I got a headache after 2 sprays. If you like VERY sweet fragrances, this one is perfect for you, if not, I'd suggest elixir or one of the other 1 millions. Solid 8/10 for me, but that's just because I dont like super sweet scents. Great projection and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2120833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2120833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118598" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="petewentos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1381735.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="petewentos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-55785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau"title="Le Beau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381735">petewentos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 16:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon the initial spray, the ozonic notes appear with the hazelnut and plum following soon after with a faint citrus scent. The plum and light ozonic notes dominate the opening, with the honey and hazelnut adding a heavenly and decadent gourmand accord. The soft woods peek through soon after, adding a woody tone to the fragrance profile. After a while, the white florals become more pronounced, adding a softness to the fragrance while still maintaining that honey and hazelnut accord that lingers throughout most of the scent. The oakmoss stands out the most when the base notes hit, which gives it a damp earthy feel balanced out by the sweetness. This fragrance recently became my signature due to its unique and irresistible gourmand accord. Despite this, some might not be as into the sweetness and it can be cloying when applied too heavily.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2118598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2118598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2117520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2117520" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IsaakCortes24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2050974"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2050974.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IsaakCortes24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2117520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2117520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2050974">IsaakCortes24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-07">04/07/24 16:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First let me start of by saying if your on the fence about getting it, get it, it is easily one of my favorite 1 million fragrances, (which isnt saying much as I enjoy almost all of them) this is one of my fragrances that I had to pick up for retail due to it not being on discounters anymore and it was still very much worth it. The opening when you first spray it on is like this sweet fresh plum with some ozonics and a hint of citrus notes. As the scent progresses you get this rich nuttyness and honey aspect that is just amazing.<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2117520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2117520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Grab you one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2116043"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2116043#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112439" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FRESHST4RT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2003594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FRESHST4RT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Lucky"title="1 Million Lucky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112439ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112439" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2003594">FRESHST4RT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my 2nd ever real fragrance, behind Y edp, and It's still one of my favorites. It's relatively versatile but it shouldn't be worn in the summer but it kinda depends on where you live, I'm in AZ and there is no way this could be worn in the summer. It lasts around 8 hours and projects for about 2-3, then settles down to a skin scent. For the amount of sprays, I would go with 6-7 and for spring/hotter weather 5, because if you overspray it can be cloying. Great signiture scent and works really well for a daily. 9.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2112439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2112439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109616" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109616" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zpmghal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zpmghal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Chergui-2762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chergui"title="Chergui"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109616ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109616" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892159">Zpmghal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 04:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>too synthetic but yeah it gets compliments</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2075323" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MoctezumaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580947"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580947.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MoctezumaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-and-James/Nirvana-Bourbon-40269.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40269.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nirvana Bourbon"title="Nirvana Bourbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2075323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2075323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580947">MoctezumaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 22:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SMELL LIKE A MILLION DOLLARS.....<br />
<br />
.....But on vacation!  This scent is beautiful,  blended well, pleasing and very versatile for many occasions.  It is definitely more casual which is why I think it does well as a vacation scent.<br />
<br />
I got this as a Christmas gift and I took it with me on vacation to Guatemala.  My body heat really activated and amped up the formula.  It felt just fresh enough during the day and just cozy enough during the cool evenings.  It had good longevity and could smell it on my clothes after 1-2 washes.<br />
<br />
Rumor has it that this is or is going to get discontinued.....but it's been almost 3 years of that rumor and you can still pick this up at your local Macy's.  I might get me another bottle or try and look for it at a discounter.<br />
<br />
Either way....this is beautiful to wear and with the 10-12 sprays I normally do with any fragrance....this rendered many compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2075323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2075323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070021" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
