       10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2069794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2069794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2069495" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Test strip zaddy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1967692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Test strip zaddy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2069495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2069495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1967692">Test strip zaddy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-21">02/21/24 10:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this scent. Its ideal for date night, or a night on the town. Sweet is the first thing youll notice. Its an exciting and refreshing mix of sweet and fresh that you dont see too often. Its not blue like a lot of sweet freshies. There are lots of warm notes in here like jasmine and hazelnut that really round off the sweetness with warmth and serenity. All that honey and light, fresh/airy/ozonic notes go so well with the sweet and warm woody base. You would think that these two dichotomies would clash, but the light freshness with the sweetness is done very well. Its an attention grabber and a compliment monster. It might be a bit too sweet if youre hypermasculine and mature in your preferences. Not a good blind buy as it is not middle of the road in my mind. Its my favorite fragrance from Paco Rabanne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2069495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2069495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2067461" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DaveCave"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1340482"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1340482.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DaveCave" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2067461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2067461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1340482">DaveCave</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is just great and I got it for an insane price during the pandemic. Sweet plum with hazelnut! Wife loves it and thats all I need to know! 200 ml will do just fine!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2067461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2067461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060517" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SketchMotive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SketchMotive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820637">SketchMotive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 19:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had to finally check out this hype beast and decided to blind buy a 6.8oz. Frankly, it's a bit of dissapointment for me, but only in the performance department. All the notes are there and it's a unique vibe - I really like the hazelnut and playful sweetness while remaining fairly masculine. It's a casual, versatile, mass appealing fragrance that leans pretty youthful. It's got a bit of a suntan lotion vibe from the nutty sweetness that's somewhat reminiscent of coconut. It could be cloying in hot weather, especially if the performance was stronger, so I'd say Lucky will shine Fall through Spring weather. <br />
<br />
All that being said, I was quite surprised to discover it's only in the 4-5 hour longevity range with mild projection for me - shockingly weak for a cologne with that kind of heavy note breakdown and sweetness. I've applied it 3 times today, and it still didn't make it through. You think it's gonna go the distance... then it just fades away long before its time. While I don't consider it a blind-buy fail, it's definitely over-hyped and over-priced unless you can get a steep discount (which is pretty much impossible).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2060517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2060517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058541" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aloms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933685"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933685.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aloms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Lucky"title="1 Million Lucky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933685">aloms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I picked up this fragrance at Dillards today and it exceeded my expectations for a overused fragrance. The plum is actually very prominient in the start but it is very sweet and refreshing. Once it dries down<br />
I don't notice any honey whatsoever in this but it does smell like a very refreshing sweet hazelnut, very gourmand but not too sweet so its tolerable for a manly man. You can also feel a little bit of patchouli and it fits in very good with the plum. In my opinion this is super versatile but better for school throughout all the year, besides extremely hot summer months because the hazelnut can be cloying if oversprayed. Its a beautiful masterpiece of a fragrance but sadly can't rate the projection and longevity because I recently got it. Overall a 10/10 nutty soft creamy smell which is a very all rounder fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2058541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2058541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2053865" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="retinatelevision"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976283"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1976283.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="retinatelevision" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Imaginary-Authors/Cape-Heartache-22477.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22477.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cape Heartache"title="Cape Heartache"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2053865ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2053865" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976283">retinatelevision</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-06">02/06/24 08:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this one is POTENT. smells a lot like b&amp;bw whiskey reserve shower gel in my opinion. also smells a little bit like axe, but that could be due to how strong it was. <br />
for me this isn't one of those fragrances where i can pick out any of the notes or where the notes eventually come out as it fades.<br />
only one spray and it's nearly cloyingly sweet and strong. not for me, but it isn't terrible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2053865"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2053865#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052747" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Felixthreeone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Felixthreeone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Uden-Overdose-52433.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52433.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uden Overdose"title="Uden Overdose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052747ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052747" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657">Felixthreeone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great sweet all-rounder from the house. I love the parfum, too, but this one is more all-season imho. This is a great fragrance for anyone who doesn't take themselves too seriously. I hate putting age limitations on fragrances, it is ridiculous.to me. I'm pushing 50 and regularly rock frags that the snobs say are 'for clubbing' and 'too youthful'. C'mon. Stop subscribing to these ideas, and wear what smells good to you and works on your skin. I've never gotten anything but positive compliments from my wife and my kids, and their friends, with fragrances like this, and by the way people talk in here, anything over 30 is considered 'old'. I guess I'm stuck wearing egoiste platinum or eau sauvage for the rest of my life? Yeah, no. Too funny. Wear what you like, when you like, with what you like. Within reason, of course. Be courteous, particularly with fragrances like this that do tend to project and do tend to be a bit much in hot weather. Just my opinion, and I wholeheartedly recommend this to anyone who just enjoys life.<br />
<br />
Edit 10/24: Haven't worn this is in a while, but the performance seems to be not as good as I remember? Put about 10 sprays on this morning, and my wife said she couldn't smell it (less than an hour later)? IDK. I couldn't either, really. So I am baffled.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2052747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2052747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emiliomontalvoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917121"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1917121.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emiliomontalvoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Haramain-Perfumes/Detour-Noir-70748.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70748.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dtour Noir"title="Dtour Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917121">emiliomontalvoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 11:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy this fragrance very much, but to my skin it doesn't last as long as I'd like  to. The hazelnut note is very prominent and very nice, To be honest I can't smell the honey that everyone talks about, but this is a great scent otherwise. If you like the "One Million" line but you want something different and not as overpriced as other flakers  can be such as "Priv", you can't go wrong with this. Projects nicely and also lasts ok, great blind buy imo  !!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2052033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2052033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its sexy it works amazing with the sweetness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2047839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2047839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958565">SpiderDog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-26">01/26/24 09:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This shit is so gas </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2042597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2042597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040852" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="War3ame"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1875829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1875829.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="War3ame" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1875829">War3ame</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 14:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This cologne is phenomenal scent, extremely unique and perfect for younger guys. It has a gorgeous honey nutmeg smell with this most perfect nutty smell. I detected slight scents of bubblegum? However it works well with the fragrance it smells amazing. Main issue i have with this is the project and silage are slightly weak other then that no concerns.<br />
<br />
Projection: 5/10<br />
Longevity: 7/10<br />
Scent: 8.5/10<br />
Silage: 6/10<br />
<br />
Overall rating: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2040852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2040852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036453" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanillalova"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1739161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanillalova" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/You-Or-Someone-Like-You-43531.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43531.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You Or Someone Like You"title="You Or Someone Like You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739161">vanillalova</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-20">01/20/24 07:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>recently got a 70/100ml tester for a bargain at around ~40 USD after conversion, batch code 82711-2018 Sept batch, clear glass. Loved this even from the decant I got(dark bottle formula)<br />
<br />
Bottle:<br />
Some say its quite tacky, but I like it :D. The atomiser, however, is horrible, comparable to a decant atomiser IMO.<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
lovely plum, honey, nutty scent, with ozonic and floral touches. Quite sweet as you can guess from the notes.<br />
really unique, haven't smelled this anywhere in my country at least.<br />
now, a lot of people may have said that this was reformulated in the dark bottle version, but honestly, I really can't tell a difference, scent-wise. Maybe the clear glass one lasts like an hour longer but that could also be due to maceration.<br />
<br />
performance:<br />
solid 8~hrs of longevity. 2 ft of projection for the 1st 2hrs, slowly dies down to a skin scent by the 5th hour. could barely detect it after the 8hr+ mark.<br />
The plum and ozonic notes disappear 1st, after about an hour.<br />
the honey and hazelnut in the mids last till the 6th~ hour, till the base notes which on my skin smell like some sort of floral note/accord? for the next 2 hrs till it disappears completely.<br />
(note that I have dry skin and live in a tropical climate, luckily it was raining when I did a full wearing, @25*c/77f)<br />
<br />
when to wear?<br />
would suggest it for cooler weather, though you could pull it off on a summer day/night IF it's not scorching hot(&gt;30c/80f) should be fine since there are ozonic notes to help balance it out, but I would control my sprays if so.<br />
Not a formal/professional scent by any means, quite youthful, maybe under 30? Good for outings/parties.<br />
<br />
At the end of the day, these are my opinions and wear what you like, whenever you like, within reason . Keep smelling great and have a nice day.<br />
<br />
TL:DR:<br />
lovely plum, honey, nutty scent, with ozonic and floral touches.Sweet.Unique<br />
 8~hrs of longevity. 2 ft of projection for the 1st 2hrs, slowly dies down to a skin scent by the 5th hour. could barely detect it after the 8hr+ mark.<br />
would suggest it for cooler weather, though you could pull it off on a summer day/night IF it's not scorching hot(&gt;30c/80f). (note that I have dry skin and live in a tropical climate, luckily it was raining when I did a full wearing, @25*c/77f)<br />
quite youthful, maybe under 30? Good for outings/parties.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2036453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2036453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036022" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bizzy1995"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bizzy1995" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702">Bizzy1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 16:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Highly ozonic fresh citrusy opening. Dries down to a warm, sweet (almost gormound, but not quite) slightly fruit scent. Definitely masculine fragrance with a hint of femininity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2036022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2036022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032997" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032997" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KingSalmonV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976350"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="KingSalmonV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032997ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032997" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976350">KingSalmonV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In my opinion this is the best out of the whole lineup it lasts me about 7-9 hours on skin and I get so many compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2032997"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2032997#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032991" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1935968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1935968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032991ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032991" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1935968">Xela</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 16:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First Impression on skin.<br />
<br />
- First ~15 Minutes: Fruity sweetness, citrusy, a hint of freshness, extremely feint musk? maybe oak moss?, tiny hint of florals, no hint of woodiness.<br />
<br />
- ~1 Hour Later: Freshness almost gone, citrus not as strong now but still in the background, sweetness remains but turning smoother and syrup like, still a feint musky or oak moss note (barely noticeable), florals getting stronger, still no hint of woodiness.<br />
<br />
- ~2 Hour Later: Freshness completely gone, citrus almost gone, sweetness remains 50% fruity and 50% syrup, still a hint of musk or oak moss, florals still there, woodiness is starting to show up (drying up tall grass, earthy like).<br />
<br />
- ~4 Hours Later: Very feint citrus notes, sweetness is much smoother now, still a hint of musk or oak moss, florals getting weaker, woodiness taking the lead now.<br />
<br />
- ~8 Hours Later: Still the same, couldn't test more after 8 hours since I had a shower after.<br />
<br />
After trying a few 1 Million flankers I have to say, this and the Elixir are my favourite (I never got the chance to try Prive), can't really put one above the other since they are completely different.<br />
<br />
TLDR: If you're looking for a Fruity Sweet, Citrusy, Fresh and Woody fragrance this is for you, and grab it quick because it's been discontinued everywhere but the US.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2032991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2032991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032859" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hellonina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1658523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hellonina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1658523">hellonina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 14:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelled this for the first time on a plane. All of a sudden, I was enveloped in a gorgeous cloud of grounded, fresh, not-too-sweet gourmand, and subtle flowers that lingered for hours as I tried to figure out where it was coming from. It was the best thing I ever smelled, at first it smelled like chocolate, some type of fruit, and light florals, with a lightness and aromatic buoyancy that kept it from being too heavy or harshly sweet. I couldn't figure it out, but I realized it was coming from the man behind me, so I deduced that it was a cologne, not a perfume. I then spent weeks sniffing colognes until I smelled One Million Lucky and realized.... I finally found it!!!! Unfortunately for me, upon wearing it, I become immediately nose-blind to the scent. I even tried overspraying, but all I could smell from it was a men's deodorant-y freshness around me and a bit of sweetness on my skin. It just didn't turn into the gorgeous, nuanced smell that I know it can be. I ultimately returned it, but I stand by the fact that on other people, and especially men, this is one of the most amazing smells in the world.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2032859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2032859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028299" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2028299" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skellyjelly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1924902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="skellyjelly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2028299ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2028299" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924902">skellyjelly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 20:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know how to feel about this fragrance. Looking at the notes, it should be something I love, but I just got a strange mix of notes that didn't play well at all. This smells like a basic woody mens colong. At the top, I definitely get bergamot and just wood. You won't smell like Home Depot or like a nice, lush forest; it just smells like wood, nothing special. Strangely later, after a few hours, I get some floral and green notes that jasmine and vetiver stick out to me. It gives off classic, clean men's cologne vibes to me, and I can't pull that off. It's ok, I wouldn't add this to my collection, but if you like a nice, solid woodsy fragrance, then go ahead. This fragrance is objectively good, but I have smelled better woody fragrances. If I smelt this on someone else, I would give it an 8/10, but on me and my personal preferences, it would be a 4/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2028299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2028299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018722" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018722" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tf2GuyCampz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1956364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tf2GuyCampz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018722ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018722" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1956364">Tf2GuyCampz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 06:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance starts off with a juicy plum opening. It then, as it dries down, brings in the hazelnut. It kinda smells like Nutella. It is not cloying in my experience with it. If you like sweet frags, you might like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2018722"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2018722#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017512" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrDanish"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473678"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1473678.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrDanish" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Eau-de-Parfum-48100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"title="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017512ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017512" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473678">MrDanish</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 00:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Having owned 1 Million Lucky (dark bottle) for a brief time, I was somewhat surprised to find this extremely overhyped. <br />
<br />
I asked my teenage son, and he didn't like it. My wife thought it was a ladies perfume and I was simply disappointed in the obvious lack of merits of the scent profile. <br />
<br />
I'm not at all surprised that this fragrance is discontinued.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2017512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2017512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2014622" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="inyourface23456"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857707"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1857707.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="inyourface23456" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-410.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.410.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gio"title="Acqua di Gio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2014622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2014622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857707">inyourface23456</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-29">12/29/23 17:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>if you used one of your 3 wishes for a genie to replicate the human perception of heaven and to make  into a fragrance this would be it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2014622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2014622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009133" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RayCashhhh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1295740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RayCashhhh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Argos/Triumph-Of-Bacchus-60777.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60777.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Triumph Of Bacchus"title="Triumph Of Bacchus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295740">RayCashhhh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-23">12/23/23 16:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Having finally put this on my skin, Lucky is a brighter lighter version of Bad Boy Extreme. Or should I say Extreme is the darker version since it came after Lucky. The hazelnuts here and the cocoa in Extreme serve the same function in the heart of the fragrance. The main difference between the two is that Lucky is sweeter due to the honey and lack of incense that Bad Boy has. Tbh, not sure if I need to add this to my collection due to the similarity, but if I ever find it at a good deal I'd go for it. I see why the community loves it, perfect for colder weather. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2009133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2009133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008799" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="laflame9942"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1856713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="laflame9942" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2008799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2008799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006004" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mitchsmellsreallygood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1084540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1084540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mitchsmellsreallygood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1084540">Mitchsmellsreallygood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 06:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The original Amyris Homme EDP by Maison Francis Kurkdjian is pretty much the more refined, less dirty niche cousin to this fragrance.  They smell about 80-90% similar. Both are excellent fragrances... this one is sadly discontinued.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2006004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2006004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005709" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Haywire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882983"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1882983.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Haywire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882983">Haywire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Been looking for this one for a little while now, as its been discontinued and is out of stock at pretty much all irl stores. Prices online are insanely inflated as well, so when I was *Lucky* - pardon the pun - to stumble across an almost full tester bottle at my local Priceline for only $30AUD, I had to pick it up. Turns out, that was an absolute steal. Really happy with this fragrance, the honey note sets it apart from the rest of the flankers, and I cant seem to stop sniffing it on my hand. This one will be reserved for special occasions as I dont want to waste it, it seems like it would be great for date nights or cozy situations. Its a shame that its discontinued, Ill certainly savour the bottle I have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2005709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2005709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005343" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005343" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="irogers217"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517547"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="irogers217" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Eau-de-Parfum-Boisee-59009.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59009.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Boise"title="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005343ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005343" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517547">irogers217</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>has been one of my go to's for the past 5 years. For new buyers, always get the clearer bottle, the recent iterations in the dark bottles (not the early 2020- summer 2023 dark bottles) have something funky within it. Im lucky to have the 2022 dark bottle as well as the 2019 clear bottles.<br />
<br />
<br />
Masterpiece of a designer fragrance, up there with 1 Million Privee. Versatile to pull of even in the summer, be cautious of sprays though!<br />
<br />
10/10. Shame its discontinued, luckily picked up 3 200 ml bottles.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2005343"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2005343#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
