align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="2004344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=2004344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998556" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweet and Strong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1730118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweet and Strong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730118">Sweet and Strong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As someone mentioned, when I smelled it recently, almost rancid. Something might be off in this fragrance after maturation, since it was an ulta tester, maybe months of maturation makes the sweet fruity profile go a bit haywire. I didn't smell this upon initial release, but I know what a rancid frag smells like. But KEEP IN MIND. tester bottle =/= BOXED bottle. If you like one million (I adore) and want a darker yet somehow equally as sweet frag, this might be up your alley.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1998556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1998556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996869" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ThatMakesScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.204461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ThatMakesScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Black-Gold-43335.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43335.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Gold"title="Black Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204461">ThatMakesScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Owned a previous bottle and loved it.. Saw it was for sale online again so went down to Macys to smell the latest version...STAY AWAY from it. I got a faint nuts and rotten fruit smell. Performance SUCKS. Nothing close to the bottle I used to own. They probably re released it for the holiday season only so they put very little effort into it and it will probably disappear afterwards. <br />
<br />
 Don't Buy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1996869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1996869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996846" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="khurram_83pk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151498"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="khurram_83pk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-412.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.412.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code"title="Armani Code"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996846ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996846" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151498">khurram_83pk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best cologne out there [period]<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1996846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1996846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995099" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DELTA55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1918404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DELTA55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918404">DELTA55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 10:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Solid 8.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1995099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1995099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994505" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MSKMAN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1301540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MSKMAN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-55785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau"title="Le Beau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301540">MSKMAN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 19:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 Million Lucky.  I've had a difficult time understanding this fragrance.  <br />
<br />
I've heard this flanker referred to as a summer version of 1 Million (perhaps due to the "Ozonic" notes), but I honestly can't see myself reaching for this in the summer.  The fragrance has this Nutella thing going on, which I find weird, but I understand why most people would like it.   As the fragrance transitions, you start to get plums peeking through here and there.  Honestly, the amberwood in this fragrance is very distracting and seems to get stronger as it dries down, which is a bit overwhelming to me.  I don't dislike this fragrance, but I feel it lacks cohesion, similar to what I said in this review.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1994505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1994505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Hazel Nut and a very smooth milky chocolate its very similar to Nutella <br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1993619" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leonnchu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leonnchu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-734.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.734.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme"title="L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1993619ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1993619" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898061">Leonnchu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-05">12/05/23 22:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind buy, I loved it at first, but it's been growing on me every day that passes. Smells very sweet, but it isn't cloying, it's more on the fresh side, I would say it's safe to wear it to work provided you don't overspray and this can work on Spring days. Smells very fruity like a fruit salad with popped wheat and honey.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1993619"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1993619#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1991765" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1991765" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jpujols"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1652773"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1652773.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jpujols" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1991765ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1991765" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1652773">Jpujols</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-03">12/03/23 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet nutty masterpiece! Get it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1991765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1991765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Muskyflower"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740743"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Muskyflower" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740743">Muskyflower</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-02">12/02/23 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried liking this 2x now. <br />
I just don't like it. <br />
<br />
Bought it about a year ago from ulta and returned it. <br />
<br />
Bought it yesterday from Sephora and returned it today. <br />
<br />
To my nose, this smells like poison. <br />
<br />
I prefer the Royal, the OG, the Parfum and the Elixir over Lucky.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1990902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1990902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989022" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#453 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
I was going to try out another Amouage scent today, but I had an endodontist appointment and thought, "they tend to be beast mode scents it might be too much." So I reached for one of my sample vials and pulled this out. I thought, "This is just an EDT, should be fine."  Well I'm glad I put it on at 5am and my appointment wasn't until 11am, because it would have been too much if my appointment had been at 8, and the new-to-the practice doctor I saw was a straight up Indian beauty. Not that it would do me any good anyway, but I was happily content she wouldn't be talking about my excessive use of cologne to the other women in the practice when I left. <br />
<br />
For an EDT this fragrance has uncommon staying power and strong projection, which my test run with the 1 Million Elixir didn't deliver at all. "Lucky" (I hate the name and it's appeal to juvenile crudity) is a much more likeable scent than Elixir, which dried down to nothing but balsam and cedar in minutes. Very disappointing. The Parfum, on the other hand, with all the florals, amber, tropicals, leather, musk, coconut, was just sensory overload (very heavy, even syrupy), but at least it lasted all day. <br />
<br />
"Lucky" is a lighter scent than the Parfum, a more aromatic fragrance thanks in part to the orange blossom and jasmine, and mostly thanks to the citrus notes, which are not the synthetic, powdered Kool-aid smelling nastiness Arab clone-makers often use when they add citrus to their scents. It's also not the harshly sharp-smelling citrus opening I remember from the original scent in 2008. "Lucky" is woody and mossy enough not to come off girly. Thankfully the plum note smells like plum and not prune juice, which is what the plum smells like in Lataffa "Ishq Al Shuyukh Silver." Finally, the hazelnut is not prominent to the point of making the scent smell like nut butter, something I've definitely found in a few scents with nutty notes.<br />
<br />
The downside of wearing  a very popular men's scent like this, one that's been on the market for more than a decade, is a lot of women will recognize it. So it communicates nothing interesting and daring about your personal style, and pegs you as a follower, not a leader. Most of us are of course, but I love it when I hear, "You smell great! What is that you're wearing?" That conversation starter from an attractive woman makes my whole week. Got that from a gorgeous woman two nights ago when I was wearing Louis Vuitton "Les Sables Roses", a scent I don't even like, but she'd never run into before and swore she loved. But imagine her wondering if she should try that line, knowing how tired that line would sound if in reality everyone in the building could name the scent I was wearing. I know in 2009 my then girlfriend insisted I stop wearing 1 Million because "every divorced guy hunting a younger, hot new girlfriend is wearing it." Of course today, "every divorced guy hunting a younger, hot new girlfriend is wearing" Dior Sauvage. I think it no coincidence their spokesmodel is Johnny Depp, a 60-year-old actor best known today, not for his acting, but for his nasty divorce from wife Amber Heard and his hookup with younger, hot new girlfriend Noelle Rich. But I digress.<br />
<br />
All that said, this scent is very likeable, not cheap, but not extortionate. It is blended for playtime, not work. It's something I'd probably be comfortable taking along as my only scent on a beach vacation, as while it's certainly good for cooler weather, it can definitely stand up to heat and wind (Probably not a dip in the ocean, but the Parfum might actually survive that.). I'd give the folks in the carpool and office a break. Wearing this to the workplace, unless you work outdoors, is not a good idea because inside everyone is going to smell it for at least a couple of hours, as it will hang in the air wherever you have roamed. Now at 8 hours it's still a mild skin scent, but not projecting any longer. By my standards that's one helluva high-quality EDT that you don't find in a month of Sundays testing out fragrances.<br />
<br />
Happy Holidays everyone, and in your never-ending quest for the ultimate juice, Good Hunting!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1989022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1989022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878453">AverageJoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 12:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like iron man bubble bath from Walmart</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1985035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1985035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1982829" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Merko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696025"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1696025.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Merko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-Intense-45396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme Intense"title="Prada L'Homme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1982829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1982829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696025">Merko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-22">11/22/23 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One Million Lucky has a really nice opening which is very more-ish and gourmand. Roasted hazelnuts, plum and honey are the main notes I pick up. The hazelnut note in particular is amazing and very realistic, and for this alone I'd say it's worth you trying it.<br />
<br />
I'd say it's a slightly more mature, relaxed version of the original - but it's still a youthful scent which oozes with uplifting energy. Dries down nicely as well to something a little more woody and calm.<br />
<br />
It can be a bit cloying if too much is used, but at the same time the longevity is not the best. Spray moderately and re-spray every few hours. Overall it's not my favourite fragrance, but it shines with its own unique character.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1982829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1982829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980837" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sophiehmaria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1899422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1899422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sophiehmaria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); It became my signature scent, receiving frequent compliments from men &amp; women until, unlucky for me, I'm pretty sure it's been discontinued as it's so hard to find in Dublin. Even more difficult to find one close to similar</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1980837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1980837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scilletok"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1888112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scilletok" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1888112">Scilletok</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-19">11/19/23 03:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful scent but poor longevity and projection on my skin made me give it away after one winter. It's a winter kind of scent without the winter performance which made it kind of awkward to know when to wear it. I found it a little too obnoxious for intimate situations like dinner at the in-laws. It's more of a going on a date type of scent and the OK performance helps lean it in that direction.<br />
<br />
If you're looking for a winter beast-mode fragrance unfortunately this is not it.<br />
1 Million Elixir does better what this fragrance is trying to do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1980033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1980033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762954">Husnal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 05:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells genuinely nosegasmic. i feel the accords here r slightly off to my nose. the woodyness is not prevalent at all... its a really fruity freshie. Its very unique i feel you can pull this off all year long. it stands out from all the summer citrusy freshies personally i would even prefer this over imagination by LV. the only fruity fresh i have ever smelt and it works way to well. the only reason im not wearing this everyday is that its my friends signature.<br />
<br />
shi is literally cherry plum lemonade</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1978683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1978683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978300" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Takamojo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868288"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868288.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Takamojo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Tonka-Cola-76893.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76893.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka Cola"title="Tonka Cola"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868288">Takamojo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-16">11/16/23 15:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p> this fragrance is sentimental and emotional for me. A girl I was dating a couple years ago gave this to me as a gift cause she knew I loved this when i smelled it at the store with her. It was the first time I had ever smelled something sweet and warm on my skin. At that time I was only used to CK and Aqua Di Gio which I didn't like. <br />
<br />
She told me it was sexy and suited my personality and that really started my fragrance journey and 1 Million Lucky became my signature scent. She loved when I wore it and she always knew where I was by the smell of this  . Thanks Dani<br />
<br />
Anyway, it's a unisex fragrance imo. Just buy it if you can still find it at a decent price you will not be disappointed. I hope they bring it back one day. And I'm holding on to my bottle and using it sparingly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1978300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1978300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1976920" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1976920" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stinky Augie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stinky Augie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1976920ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1976920" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); Es las que estn en mis top 5 de las que ms uso en el da a da y tiene este efecto en el que a las mujeres les gusta que los hombres huelan dulce incluso algo unisex tiene un muy buen efecto en ellas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1974290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1974290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1974055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1974055" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="newbinxy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1743710"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1743710.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="newbinxy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Intensely-52802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1974055ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1974055" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1743710">newbinxy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-11">11/11/23 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is insane, utterly insane.<br />
<br />
I got this about a month ago and it has already become one of my top 3 favorite fragrances of all time.<br />
This is a very juvenile scent and works very well in school if you are going to school still.<br />
Downside is that this is discontinued and very expensive for the average teen (or kid) to buy so you should try and buy it right now before it skyrockets again.<br />
<br />
When I first got the bottle, all I smelt was bubblegum which is usually not that good but it was amazing and a loved it but over time it started smelling more nutty and woody which made it even better.<br />
<br />
MY FRAGRANCE RATING<br />
<br />
Scent: 8.5/10<br />
Longevity: 9/10<br />
Sillage: 8.5/10<br />
<br />
based on 2 sprays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1974055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1974055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972878" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceNut"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1448577.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceNut" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448577">FragranceNut</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 18:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is on a different plane of existence, they need to bring it back or re-release later down the road. This is a gem of a fragrance, super versatile and extremely sexy in every situation.<br />
<br />
It has been broken down 100 times, opens with some citrus &amp; ozone and dries down to a sweet (honey) nutty woody smell. Longevity and projection are steller for an EDT. Room filling for the first 3 hours, and leaves a nice scent trail in the air. Wearer may become anosmic, but ask anyone around you and they will let you know it's still there. The scent lasts about 6-8 hours on my skin. Recommended wear through all four seasons, with hot summers being only nights.<br />
<br />
<br />
Absolute killer fragrance, can't believe it was discontinued. Had to get a full bottle of it before it goes $130+.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1972878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1972878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972750" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pacific-Chill-81423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Chill"title="Pacific Chill"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably the most hyped 1 Million flanker behind 1 Million Prive. With 1 Million Prive being a modern masterpiece, I had high hopes for this one. Did it rise to the occasion or disappoint? Let's discuss;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
Opening is sweet, fruity, nutty, and a little woody. Instantly I get the plum, grapefruit, hazelnut, honey, and cedar. I also get just a touch of the florals and ozonic notes. The dry down is sweet, nutty, gourmand, and woody. The plum is the only fruit note still left, but it's noticeable and compliments the honey note well. The patchouli has come to the front along with the hazelnut to give a chocolatey vibe and the wood notes have become more prominent. <br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection strong, around six feet. Sillage matches that with a heavy scent trail. Around 4 hours later the projection was still about 3 feet with a strong scent trail. Altogether the scent lasted close to 24 hours on my skin, giving it an easy certification for eternal.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is most suitable for fall/winter wear, but could be worn day or night. The sweetness of the scent would be too much in warmer weather. Too strong for office wear, but would be a good pick for a date night.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like the 1 Million line, or you like sweet, nutty, gourmand scents, this is a safe blind buy. Nothing disappointing here.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
Although it doesn't beat Prive for best in the 1 Million line, it's still a wonderful scent that I'm happy to own. In true 1 Million fashion, it's sweet, it's strong, and it's got the performance to last all day. A solid pick for any gentleman's fall/winter rotation. I bought this out of FOMO because I couldn't find it at any online discounters. Afterwards, I spoke to the Paco Rabanne representative at my local mall who advised me they had initially discontinued it, but now corporate is "talking about bringing it back". It sounds hopeful, but it's far from a sure thing. If you're interested in this one, grab it while you can.<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 10/10<br />
Sillage: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1972750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1972750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966724" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toby Alexandru"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1791456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toby Alexandru" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791456">Toby Alexandru</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this on a trip to Paris. Although I think I may have gotten a bad batch cause the performance in terms of longevity is horrible. It smells wonderful while it lasts though, but 2-3 hours is unfortunately just not enough performance for me. I rarely ever wear this due to the bad performance, but I do like smelling it from time to time. Matter of fact Im smelling it right as Im writing this review. The fragrance has an interesting mix of fresh and sweet notes that just work so well together. It has a sweet nutty scent almost all the way through from that hazelnut (reminding me of coconut) and the plum ties it in beautifully and rounds off the fragrance. Amazing scent just mine has poor longevity. <br />
<br />
Id say this is perfect for spring/autumn and works for both night and daytime. Leaning a bit more to the youthful side, but older guys could still pull this off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1966724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1966724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966327" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966327" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MZMpac81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1706791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MZMpac81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-41698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking"title="Viking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966327ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966327" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706791">MZMpac81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-01">11/01/23 18:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Huge fan of this one. I've spent nearly a year with it; for sure a cool-to-cold weather scent. I get caramel candy on a warm nutty-woodsy base. Good longevity, 6-8 hours for me. Eminently pleasing. I suppose it could be overdone like anything else, but I've never gotten tired of it. Not a daily, but the best of the One Million line IMO. Women love it too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1966327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1966327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1960901" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frank_it_0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1763211.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frank_it_0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1960901ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1960901" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1960901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1960901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960217" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
