But there still might be a large stock. I'm sure the price will start to go up quite a bit as the stock dries up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1960217"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1960217#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1959098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1959098" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshTones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1069218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshTones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Superz/Gold-Dust-80301.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80301.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Dust"title="Gold Dust"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1959098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1959098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069218">FreshTones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not of my normal reviews (I may have even reviewed this one, don't remember). Just came here to say that Lucky is readily available on the official site with a "Best Seller" tag on it. Highly doubtful that it's discontinued or as another poster mentioned, maybe they brought it back? Just a bit of info for ya'll.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1959098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1959098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1955653" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Adam117"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Adam117" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1955653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1955653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606716">Adam117</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-19">10/19/23 01:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fruity, sweet and nutty.<br />
Whilst retaining some aspects of the original 1 million, it would take a wild guess to discern whether this is a flanker or not if it weren't for the title.<br />
Opening is amazingly crisp, light and smooth with sweet honey and fruit notes. It's quite an addicting opening, not too heavy, and I see it suiting both men and women of young to mid 20's - amazing for a warm summer night at a bar. Many sweet memories of people and spontaneous ventures wearing this...<br />
I've found the dry down to present itself quite rapidly. This is where the nuttiness hits, which is pleasant, however I've found it can be a little polarising as it lingers for quite long, often making me feel sick and want to take a shower.<br />
<br />
overall, 8/10 fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1955653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1955653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954567" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nibolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1663625.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nibolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663625">nibolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 19:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>fresh fruity and nutty<br />
a very well done fresh and sweet scent very balanced with a delicious honey note paired with hazelnut and plum.<br />
about 8 hours longevity with strong projection throughout.<br />
one of my favorites<br />
9,5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1954567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1954567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1948041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1948041" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MountainDewd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662380"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1662380.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MountainDewd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1948041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1948041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662380">MountainDewd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-09">10/09/23 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gentlemen, I never would have thought I would say this but, I can confirm that I got Lucky wearing this bad boy </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1948041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1948041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946847" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daviako"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1283300.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daviako" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Profondo"title="Acqua di Gi Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946847ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946847" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283300">Daviako</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 23:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I honestly don't know how I have gone this long without reviewing this one. I've had it in my collection since 2018. I remember buying it from a friend who was working in the fragrance section at Macy's (he also *threw* in a tester of JPG Le Male that I traded with a friend for a full bottle of Givenchy Pour Homme Blue Label). Living in Florida, you don't get too many chances to wear fragrances like this with our heat.  Last night, I decided to wear it and was reminded how good a fragrance this is. I sprayed it on myself and my clothes. Fast forward to the next day (over 12 hours later) and I am still getting whiffs off my clothes.<br />
<br />
 It's interesting in a way, because looking at the notes, there is more than a passing resemblance between 1ML and the original Gentleman by Givenchy (the 1974 version that was less than appealing to me). Yet the ozonic notes breathe a modern, fresher life into 1ML that allows this to be used in slightly warmer weather than one might think, and the rose and tarragon in Gentleman start it off harsh and don't help it mellow out much better. 1ML is quite the opposite, although I can see how the opening might turn some people off. If you can get past it, however, you'll likely be pleasantly surprised by how nice the dry down is, and how long it lasts.<br />
<br />
9/10<br />
<br />
11-24 Update: Moved to GA earlier this year and got the chance to wear this during a cooler day. 3 DAYS later, I am sorting laundry, and as I threw the sweater I was wearing when I sprayed this on into its pile, the scent trail passed by me as if I had just sprayed it on earlier. Longevity (and to a slightly lesser extent, sillage) is insane with this one, at least on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1946847"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1946847#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945812" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="will_i_smell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="will_i_smell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520178">will_i_smell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 15:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The original and Prive are SO well blended, put together, and smooth. I saw the notes for Lucky and was super excited. As many below have shared, it very much has a feminine, perfumy, screechiness, and just smells like something a woman would wear. I have purchased and sold this 3 seperate times over a 3 or 4 year period, wanting THAT bad to like this, as I absolutely love the original and Prive. Every time I am immediately reminded of why I just can't stand it. I kept thinking I was missing something, maybe I had a bad bottle, maybe my nose had matured...no. <br />
So, I have retired myself from trying to dig this and am leary of trying the newer flankers. Maybe one day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1945812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1945812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1937251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930103" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nico Adam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829677"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1829677.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nico Adam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930103ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930103" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829677">Nico Adam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-17">09/17/23 06:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of my favorits from the 1 million line.<br />
Sweet, (a little nutty) with a little freshness too it.<br />

Scent: 7-10<br />
Projection: 6-10<br />
Longiverty: 7-10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1930103"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1930103#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929255" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="millerje86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1283877.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="millerje86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Coral-Fantasy-71761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283877">millerje86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive had this one for a while, and grabbed it at the same time as Priv. At that time, Priv and the discontinued Intense were all the hype, with the divisive Cologne and newly added Parfum on the fringes, hardly heard anyone talk about Lucky. Which I always thought was strange because this always stood out and was always my favorite of the bunch - personally I think it was just a few years ahead of its time and were it released today it would have been a much bigger hit, possibly even a hype beast fragrance. <br />
<br />
It has the same kind of nutty/sweetness that all the new releases are clinging to, but somehow this pulls off an ozonic and fresh feel with ease. It does what SWY Freeze and so many others tried to do and it does it well. Still a little too sweet to wear year round imo, but this is an easy reach for 3 seasons. Maybe a little too juvenile for some, but this is one of the few I liked enough to grab a backup bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1929255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1929255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1926454" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jakerei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1728961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1728961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jakerei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1926454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1926454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1728961">jakerei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-12">09/12/23 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didnt see the magic with this fragrance the first time I tried it turns out I had a bad sample! This stuff is awesome.<br />
<br />
Very nice mix of plum and honey. Really sets itself apart from the other 1 Million fragrances. 1 Million EDT and 1 Million Parfum are so bubblegum sweet; this fragrance has a great amount of sweetness but still feels light and fresh. Bummer to hear they discontinued this flanker because I would consider it their best product.<br />
<br />
Unfortunately, I'm one of the few that have longevity issues with this fragrance. I ended up selling my bottle of this because of it, but it's still a nice scent regardless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1926454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1926454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1925686" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="raistakilhara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1041398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1041398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="raistakilhara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nikos/Sculpture-Homme-925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sculpture Homme"title="Sculpture Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1925686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1925686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810503">yuvahl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-07">09/07/23 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>been looking for this one for quite a while as i always see people recommending this fragrance. one million parfum was my first ever fragrance that i bought so some part of me just had smell this. today, i on a whim decided to just take a look at the typical pharmacy with fragrances in it, and to my surprise, it was there! <br />
and oh my god this deserves every bit of praise it gets. the scent itself is sweeter than the parfum yet its still similar to the parfum. this lasted me for 12 hours including a shower and my cousin could smell it from the other side of the room. highly recommend to get your hands on this. getting all of this for 55 dollars is just amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1921982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1921982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="48903" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent949552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc949552" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CB23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/998670"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.998670.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CB23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Amber-Sky-39886.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39886.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Sky"title="Amber Sky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma949552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd949552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/998670">CB23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-05">06/05/18 02:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So many of these reviews are from people that havent tried this fragrance.<br />
<br />
Im curious why so much hatred? Did one of the Paco Rabanne models sleep with your girlfriend or something?<br />
<br />
It smells nothing like the original 1 million or Invictus, its a sweet fragrance great for cold weather, ugly bottle but a beautiful hazelnut gourmand, possibly the best from the line along with Prive and intense</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="949552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=949552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1051473" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1051473" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alvinzm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134731"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1134731.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alvinzm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Oud-Maracuja-83842.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83842.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Maracuj"title="Oud Maracuj"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1051473ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1051473" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134731">alvinzm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-16">04/16/19 05:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is arguably the best 1 Million, in my opinion.<br />
<br />
Firstly, the bottle looks gorgeous. It is not as eye-catching as the original (and that's great!). I like the bottle more than 1 Million Prive, too. The only downside about the bottle is that it is a fingerprint magnet. The sprayer is also great.<br />
<br />
1 Million Lucky smells fantastic (sorry, I ran out of adjectives to describe how great the scent really is). While it is a gourmand fragrance and very fruity, it is very fresh and well-rounded. It opens up with a heavy but pleasant and weirdly sensual hazelnut with light aquatic/ozonic notes. After that, the plum and honey starts to become prominent. At the drydown, the patchouli starts to be present and it is just sublime. I can smell the hazelnut at every phase (base, mid, and top) and I love it!<br />
<br />
1 Million Lucky lasts super long. I mean, really freakin long. I sprayed it at 5.30 AM and it projects well until 1 PM with great projection (a rare occasion for my skin and the weather), and I can smell the trails until right now at 7 PM (although very close to the skin).<br />
<br />
It is more suitable for winter and fall use but I actually don't care about that since I can wear this one everytime in the year. I can say that it is suitable for both night and day use. It is also very unique and creative.<br />
<br />
In a nutshell, 1 Million Lucky is what a heaven smells like. It is long-lasting, smells sweet, nutty, and fruity while bringing freshness to the table. It is long-lasting, projects very well, very versatile, and a great deal for a fragrance this great.<br />
<br />
----------------<br />
<br />
Things I'd like to state:<br />
- At first, I have a very low expectation for this one, but turns out it is one of my best purchases so far.<br />
- I thought it is going to be sickly sweet, but it is really well-balanced. This information is very important, especially for those of you who don't like gourmand/sickly sweet fragrances.<br />
- Please, try it for yourselves first before judging. Many people in this forum are ignorant enough to rate many fragrances (especially flankers) very low without trying them first. I don't think it deserves the hate.<br />
- I don't like the original 1 Million, but this one is very different and I really love it.<br />
- I'm not bluffing, it lasts for about 2 days on my clothes.<br />
<br />
---------------<br />
<br />
Rating<br />
<br />
Scent Opening - 9.6/10<br />
Scent Drydown - 9.6/10<br />
Longevity - 9.8/10<br />
Projection - 9.2/10<br />
Versatility - 8.5/10<br />
Uniqueness - 9.5/10<br />
Value - 9/10<br />
Presentation - 9.2/10<br />
----<br />
Overall - 9.3/10 (Very solid and recommended)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1051473"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1051473#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1618459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1618459" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ddu2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ddu2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1618459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1618459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390424">ddu2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-06">08/06/22 18:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(The content was written with Google Translate, so it may be unnatural.)<br />
I bought the 2021(batch 13401) amber glass version tester.<br />
I liked the scent so much that I started reading the reviews.<br />
<br />
Among the reviews I read, I saw a review that the contents of this perfume were reformulated along with the glass color change.<br />
<br />
After seeing the review, I was curious about the scent of the clear glass version,<br />
I found and purchased the 2019(batch 92611) transparent glass version product on the Internet.<br />
After I received the item and let it stabilize for a few days, I sprayed two perfumes on each test paper.<br />
<br />
Although the 2019 version felt a little more stable,<br />
There was no significant difference between amber glass and transparent glass.<br />
I asked all my family and friends, but none of them could tell the difference.<br />
Similarly, it was the same when comparing it by spraying it directly on the skin.<br />
<br />
And finally, among the reviews here,<br />
I also read that the contents of the perfume may have been diluted with the change from clear glass to amber glass.<br />
So I put the two perfumes in the each transparent bottle and compared the colors, but I couldn't feel any difference at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1618459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1618459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1090833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1090833" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shayz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/797286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.797286.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shayz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-Cologne-34582.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34582.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit Cologne"title="Fahrenheit Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1090833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1090833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); 1 million lucky has a crazy!! mode performance. <br />
it last more than 12 hours and i can smell it all day,even after a shower it is still there.<br />
for me all paco rabanne fragrance has very good quality and longevity.<br />
i really love and respect this hose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1090833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1090833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1110673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Rating: 9.25/10<br />
Compliments: 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="1110673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=1110673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="48903" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc985033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jcsa.007"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1166422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jcsa.007" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma985033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd985033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1166422">jcsa.007</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-24">09/24/18 20:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is very sweet, I loved it at first but now Im unfortunately getting very sick of it.<br />
The opening is very nutty and the dry down is mainly honey. Projection is very good for 1 hour, silage is fantastic and longevity is about 5 hours. <br />
Dont get me wrong the scent is nice but the sweetness gets very tiring. Before you buy this you should definitely get a sample and wear it a couple times to see if you get sick of it or not<br />
Paco Rabanne is one of my favorite houses so I was kind of disappointed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="48903"comment_id="985033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html?ccid=985033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;     // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
